org.andengine.entity

Interface IEntity

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDisposable, IDrawHandler, IUpdateHandler
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IAreaShape, IMenuItem, IShape
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnalogOnScreenControl, AnimatedSprite, AnimatedSpriteMenuItem, BaseMenuItemDecorator, BaseOnScreenControl, BatchedPseudoSpriteParticleSystem, BatchedSpriteParticleSystem, BlendFunctionParticleSystem, ButtonSprite, CameraScene, ColorMenuItemDecorator, DiamondSprite, DigitalOnScreenControl, DynamicSpriteBatch, Entity, HUD, Line, MenuScene, Mesh, ParticleSystem, Rectangle, RectangularShape, ScaleMenuItemDecorator, Scene, ScreenCapture, ScreenGrabber, Shape, Sprite, SpriteBatch, SpriteGroup, SpriteMenuItem, SpriteParticleSystem, Text, TextMenuItem, TickerText, TiledSprite, UncoloredSprite, UniformColorSprite

extends IDrawHandler, IUpdateHandler, IDisposable

      • queryFirstForSubclass

        <S extends IEntity> S queryFirstForSubclass(IEntityMatcher pEntityMatcher)
        Parameters:
        pEntityMatcher -
        Returns:
        the first child (recursively!) that matches the supplied IEntityMatcher or null if none matches..
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassCastException - when the supplied IEntityMatcher matched an IEntity that was not of the requested subtype.

      • queryForSubclass

                                                        throws java.lang.ClassCastException
        Parameters:
        pEntityMatcher -
        Returns:
        all children (recursively!) that match the supplied IEntityMatcher.
        Throws:

      • queryForSubclass

                                                                 L pResult)
                                          throws java.lang.ClassCastException
        Parameters:
        pEntityMatcher -
        pResult - the List to put the result into.
        Returns:
        all children (recursively!) that match the supplied IEntityMatcher.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassCastException - when the supplied IEntityMatcher matched an IEntity that was not of the requested subtype.

      • sortChildren

        void sortChildren()
        Immediately sorts the IEntitys based on their ZIndex. Sort is stable.

      • sortChildren

        void sortChildren(boolean pImmediate)
        Sorts the IEntitys based on their ZIndex. Sort is stable. In contrast to sortChildren() this method is particularly useful to avoid multiple sorts per frame.
        Parameters:
        pImmediate - if true, the sorting is executed immediately. If false the sorting is executed before the next (visible) drawing of the children of this IEntity.

      • sortChildren

        void sortChildren(IEntityComparator pEntityComparator)
        Sorts the IEntitys based on the Comparator supplied. Sort is stable.
        Parameters:
        pEntityComparator -

      • detachChild

        boolean detachChild(IEntity pEntity)
        WARNING: This function should be called from within RunnableHandler.postRunnable(Runnable) which is registered to a Scene or the Engine itself, because otherwise it may throw an IndexOutOfBoundsException in the Update-Thread or the GL-Thread!

      • isCulled

        boolean isCulled(Camera pCamera)
        Will only be performed if isCullingEnabled() is true.
        Parameters:
        pCamera - the currently active camera to perform culling checks against.
        Returns:
        true when this object is visible by the Camera, false otherwise.
